scripts.build:android: npm run build && cap sync android
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && cap sync ios
scripts.build:e2e:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:e2e:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && rm -rf ios/App/DerivedData && xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' -derivedDataPath ios/App/DerivedData
scripts.test:e2e:cloud:android: npm run build:e2e:android && maestro cloud --app-file=android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk e2e/maestro/
scripts.test:e2e:cloud:ios: npm run build:e2e:ios && maestro cloud --app-file=ios/App/DerivedData/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/App.app e2e/maestro/
